BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
HEARING – REMOTE MEETING
~ AGENDA ~

Thursday, March 25, 2021

6:00 PM

Sullivan Chamber

I. BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
City of Cambridge
Massachusetts
BOARD OF ZONING APPEAL
831 Mass Avenue, Cambridge, MA.
617) 349-6100
The Board of Zoning Appeal will hold a Virtual Public Meeting, THURSDAY - MARCH 25, 2021. Members of the
public can participate or view the meeting remotely using the Zoom Webinar link:
<https://cambridgema.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_NcNyR-ejToKfzmFibageZg>
Or join by phone: Dial +1 929 436 2866 or +1 301 715 8592 - Webinar ID: 843 1709 7972
6:30 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-107887
Residence B Zone
11-13 CLIFTON STREET
PATRICIA CALDWELL
Special Permit: Re-construct existing non-conforming 2 story porch and enclose
first story porch as part of the house.
Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2 (Non-Conforming Structure). Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40
(Special Permit).
6:45 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-108265
77 MASSACHUSETTS AVENUE
Residence C-3, Res
C-3B, SD-6, SD-8, SD-11, BB Zones
MASSACHUSETTS INSTITUTE OF TECHNOLOGY - C/O KELLEY BROWN
Variance: To install ninety-one (91) wayfinding signs and three (3) special identity
signs that need variances for installation. The proposed signs requiring
variances exceed at least one of the following requirements: the limitations per
building, height, area, or location for free-standing signs. Art. 7.000, Sec.
7.16.21.B (Area, Number, Height & Location of Signs). & Sec. 7.16.22 (Area of Sign).
7:00 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-108519
9 OAKLAND STREET - UNIT 1
Residence C-1
Zone
MOLLY WOLF & PATRICK MASCIA - C/O SEAN D. HOPE, ESQ.
Variance: To construct a second dwelling that requires side yard setback and
landscape relief.
Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). Art. 6.000, Sec. 6.48
(Landscape Buffer).
Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.30 (Variance).
Special Permit: To park cars in tandem and within the 5' side yard setback.
Art. 6.000, Sec. 6.44.1.b (Parking in the 5’ setback). & Sec. 6.43.2 (Tandem Parking).
Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40 (Special Permit).
7:15 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-109125
66 REED STREET - UNIT 1

Residence B Zone

JUDITH SILVAN
Variance: To in-fill an open area to create gross floor area on the first floor.
Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements).

City of Cambridge

7:30 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-108723
135 & 137 ELM STREET
Residence C-1 Zone
JORDAN & ELIZABETH DOLMAN & HEATHER PIERCE & ERIC LEE - C/O CAMPBELL
ELLSWORTH, ARCHITECT
Variance: Two (2) units in this four (4) unit condominium, #135 and #137, are
requesting zoning relief to build a 3rd story addition to expand their living
space. Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements).
7:45 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-109095
143 HAMILTON STREET
Residence C-3 Zone
143-145 HAMILTON ST. LLC - C/O MATT MARSHALL
Special Permit: To construct a roof deck putting the GFA at 25%.
Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.C (Non-Conforming Structure). & Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40
(Special Permit).
8:00 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-96217
173 COOLIDGE HILL
Residence A-1 Zone
GIOVANNI PARMIGIANI
Variance: To add an entry roof overhang.
Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). & Art. 10.000, Sec.
10.30 (Variance).
Special Permit: To add four (4) windows to the side of the house.
Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.2.C (Non-Conforming Structure). & Art. 10.000, Sec. 10.40
(Special Permit).
8:15 P.M. CASE NO. BZA-109452
56 CREIGHTON STREET
Residence B Zone
DUNCAN MACARTHUR - C/O ROBERT LINN, ARCHITECT
Variance: To construct an addition to an existing structure. A previous version
of this has been approved by the Board BZA-95066 but the layout has been
modified due to a mistake discovered in the certified plot plan.
Art. 5.000, Sec. 5.31 (Table of Dimensional Requirements). & Art. 8.000, Sec. 8.22.3
(Non-Conforming Structure).
Continued Cases:
6:00 P.M. CASE: BZA-100817
Original Hearing Date: 01/14/21
56 CHURCHILL AVENUE
PRITHVIRAJ & KERRY TANWAR
Special Permit: To finish basement, space to be used as a family room.
6:00 P.M. CASE: BZA-105802
Original Hearing Date: 02/25/21
383 WINDSOR STREET
JAMESON ROGERS - C/O ADAM J. GLASSMAN, R.A
Variance: To construct 3rd story addition and rear decks per existing nonconforming FAR and setbacks and increasing GFA of an existing non-conforming
structure by more than 20%.
Special Permit: To construct new and enlarged window openings and propose
exclusion of basement from the calculation of GFA.

cambridgema.gov

Agenda

Board of Zoning Appeal

March 25, 2021

7:00 P.M. CASE: BZA-96057
9 OAKLAND STREET #2
Original Hearing Date: 11/19/20
PATRICK MASCAI & MOLLY WOLF
C/O SEAN D. HOPE, ESQ.
Variance: To construct a new structure (detached dwelling) with two garage
parking spaces as follows: 1) building within the front and side yard setback
and 2) exceeding the allowable Floor Area Ratio.
Special Permit: To add a mudroom addition and windows to an existing nonconforming dwelling.

TO VIEW BZA CASE APPLICATIONS, PLANS & SUBMISSIONS, GO TO:
<https://www.cambridgema.gov/inspection/zoning.aspx> at top of page, click
“Calendar” > Click hearing date >
Click “Board of Zoning Appeal Agenda.” Any information filed after the agenda has
been posted can be viewed at the Inspectional Services Department located at 831 Mass
Avenue, Cambridge by appointment only. Copies of this petition are also on file in the
office of the City Clerk, City Hall, Cambridge, MA. Interested persons may provide
comments to the Board of Zoning Appeal by
participating virtually during the hearing and/or may provide written comments for
the Board’s consideration by mailing or delivering them to the attention of the
Secretary, Board of Zoning Appeal,
831 Mass Avenue, 02139 or by emailing them to mpacheco@cambridgema.gov
<mailto:mpacheco@cambridgema.gov>. Comments must be submitted prior to the Hearing
and include the Case Number.
Continued cases are not re-advertised but are posted on the office board at the City
Clerk’s Office in City Hall & on the same BZA Web Page 48 hours prior to hearing.

City of Cambridge

cambridgema.gov
